meanings.definition: A person who is addicted to or obsessed with hops, especially in relation to beer.
meanings.sent1: The hopheads at the brewery always seek out the hoppiest beers.
meanings.sent2: The group of hopheads gathered at the bar to taste the latest IPA.
meanings.sent3: The hopheads joked that they could smell hops from miles away.
meanings.sent4: She was such a hophead that she could identify different hop varieties blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hopheads savoring their hoppy brews was etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The hopheads in the crowd cheered loudly at the beer festival.
meanings.sent2: We invited the hopheads from the club to join us for a tasting session.
meanings.sent3: The hopheads playfully argued over which beer had the most hops in it.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of hopheads discussing their favorite brews.
meanings.sent5: In the sea of beer enthusiasts, the hopheads stood out with their hop-centric conversations.
